Text: Please leave the original file in your torrents folder a while & HELP seed, please..  1/27 seed ratio atm - THX & enjoy!~

I have to offline daily & going on vacation soon, so if nobody is kind enough to seed what they've DLd, Im afraid everyone may be out of luck soon..  If you've enjoyed the game, please keep the torrent alive.. -peace-
rows version already has all the 23 tables......

@Kerror; Well this was assembled from my old row suite, without monitoring what's out now. I just built-on & still gave credit. Only this one doesn't use an installer.  I play mine from disk & thought others might like the same portability..  :)
